Title: The Wolf of Wall Street
Overview: A New York stockbroker refuses to cooperate in a large securities fraud case involving corruption on Wall Street, corporate banking world and mob infiltration. Based on Jordan Belfort's autobiography.
Keywords: corruption, sex, sexuality, bank, humor, biography, wall street, marriage crisis, rise and fall, stockbroker, drug, stock broker
production_companies: Paramount Pictures, Appian Way, EMJAG Productions, Red Granite Pictures, Sikelia Productions
Cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill, Margot Robbie
